content:
On the night of March 25, 2024, two fires occurred due to the attacks of the Russian occupation army in the Nikolaev area as a result of the hit and fall of fragments of the whipped UAV and, according to preliminary data, 11 people were injured, 2 of which were hospitalized, others were given first aid.

This is stated inmessageState Service of Ukraine for Emergency Situations.

In particular, in the Nikolaev area of the region the enemy killed one of the objects, which caused the ignition in its territory.

Rescuers quickly eliminated the fire, there are no victims and injured.

As a result of the fall of the collapsed UAV into the territory of the private sector in Nikolaev there was a partial destruction of a two -storey apartment building.

The explosive wave was damaged by private homes nearby.

The house and two cars caught fire. The fire managed to quickly eliminate the fire.

As reported by the Armyinform, in the last day the enemyfiredAlmost 15 settlements of Kharkiv region.
title: In the Nikolaev area, more than ten people were injured because of enemy attacks
description: This is stated in the statement of the State Emergency Service of Ukraine. ...
author: Army Inform
